segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink overflowing with water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, oblivious to the mess at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle is getting bigger, and it's right under her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She could slip any moment and hurt herself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on that stool is stretching way up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is tilting back, it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he'll crash down with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is reaching up too, egging him on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage to the cabinets must be starting already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone turns off that faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids shouldn't be climbing like that without help.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's scary how unaware the adult is of all this.
segments.speaker: PAR
